DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct determine clinical response rate regimen L-methionine , betaine folate unipolar depression .

DOC.criteria: DSMIV diagnosis MDD DDNOS ; clinical indication treatment current depressive symptom ; HDS > 18 ; woman reproductive potential must use acceptable method birth control Treatment another psychotropic drug ; history mania hypomania ; history bipolar illness firstdegree relative ; active homicidality ; pregnant ; try become pregnant , nursing ; unstable medical condition ; current substance abuse past month ; history sulfa allergy
